refnamediv.refpurpose:
Configuration file for the Heartbeat cluster messaging layer
ha.cf

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para:
ha.cf is read by
heartbeat 8 upon node start-up. It lists the communication facilities enabled between nodes, enables or disables certain features, and optionally lists the cluster nodes by host name.
This file can safely be made world readable, but should be writable only by root.
